data.Name: SEAL Awards
data.Tagline: We honor leadership through our awards for business sustainability & environmental journalism while funding research
data.About:
Our environmental progress requires true leadership.  The SEAL Awards honor leaders in sustainability.

As an advocate for environmental solutions, the SEAL (representing Sustainability, Environmental Achievement and Leadership) Awards mission is fulfilled through 3 areas: 

(1) Business Sustainability Awards, 
(2) Environmental Journalism Awards, and 
(3) Environmental Research Grants.
